attributes.title: HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE
attributes.review: When I first heard about this app I was SUPER EXCITED but then when I opened it, my phone froze, the volume turned all the way up and began playing tentacle porn and didn’t allow me to exit it. I ended up needing to take my phone back to verizon where they told me they couldnt help me. I tried the apple store (tentacle porn still playing) and they couldnt get it to stop either! They told me they had a solution and it was to smash my phone on the ground and hit it repeatedly with a fire extinguisher. I cannot believe that the president’s app gave my phone a horrible STD. Absolutely horrified. Would not recommend

attributes.title: I hate this place it make me ✨ U N C O M F Y ✨

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.title: Gave virus to my phone
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! It took forever to download and when it finally did, anytime I tried to open it, my entire phone would shut down. Then when it restarted it would glitch so badly where I could barely see my screen! I asked my grandson to help me and even he couldn’t figure out what was going on. I finally took my phone to be fixed and they said they were having a lot of people come in with the same problem and the culprit was downloading this app! 🤬 They were finally able to go in and delete the app. My phone was back to normal. I repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD. WORST APP EVER.

attributes.title: Terrible app, don’t download unless you hate yourself
attributes.review: Downloaded this to keep up with the news of Trump and it restarted my phone upon downloading. Then when I tried to open the app it would just take me to my home screen. Finally after downloading and undownloading a few times I was able to open it. BUT when I opened it, it was glitching!! So bad!! I swear I must have some viruses in my phone now. It wouldn’t work on WiFi and only used my data, sucked my battery dry, and doesn’t update. Terrible app please don’t get it, it should seriously be removed from the App Store. Also Bernie 2020 😊

attributes.title: this app killed my aunt😔😾😿🙅‍♀️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app bc i support the orange god that we are lucky to call president but it literally took 3 months to finish downloading!😱👎😿 when it finally finished downloading, my phone started to glitch so much 😾👿👿🤬🤬😤😤 i had to spend money to get whole other phone but bc this app was in my icloud, it caused my new phone to glitch also!!😡😡 then one day, my aunt was choking on some crackers and i tried to look up a CPR video but the glitches brought me to a 2020 Trump campaign video instead‼️ my aunt is dead now and this app is to blame😢😢 i demand this be taken off the app store bc #alllivesmatter
